channel.title: TB Pro Invest
channel.description: Recent content on TB Pro Invest

item.title: Expectations for Bitcoin in 2025
item.description: Bitcoin, as the most well-known and valuable cryptocurrency in the world, enters 2025.

item.title: Trump supports cryptocurrencies
item.description: It’s no small matter that a former, and very possibly future, American president, Donald Trump, publicly speaks out in support of cryptocurrencies.

item.title: BTC - record price of over $72,500
item.description: Bitcoin has reached a new record level of over $72,500, and one of the reasons is that the financial regulator in the United Kingdom has stated that it will allow trading of securities backed by cryptocurrencies.

item.title: Gold breaks records despite a strong stock market and economy
item.description: The US should certainly avoid a crisis and recession, with American stock market indices at record levels, despite minor corrections.

item.title: BlackRock already owns 196,065 Bitcoins, more than MicroStrategy
item.description: BlackRock’s ETF already owns over 196,000 BTC, surpassing MicroStrategy, which has collected 193,000 pieces so far but over a much longer period.

item.title: South Korea and Bitcoin ETF?
item.description: The government of the Republic of Korea is considering the possibility of introducing spot ETFs in their country.

item.title: Coinbase stock surged by over 60% in February
item.description: The second-largest crypto exchange, Coinbase, is experiencing a surge and explosion in demand for their shares.

item.title: New ATH on BITCOIN, unprepared banks in fear
item.description: Strong growth of BTC in this 2024 year are record investments of the most powerful players in the global capital markets.

item.title: Some new finances in the future
item.description: For a long time, most people denied and refused to accept the following fact, which is that cryptocurrencies are here and they are here to stay.

item.title: Investing one time or montly??
item.description: Two different approaches and the question of which way is better?

item.title: Purchased 3,000 BTC, and achieved a profit of over 70%
item.description: MicroStrategy has purchased an additional 3,000 BTC, and it seems that Michael Saylor has fulfilled his promise when he recently said he plans to buy BTC indefinitely.

item.title: The largest interest rate cut cycle in the country's history
item.description: The price of new real estate in China is experiencing the biggest drop in the last 9 years, and additionally, the Shanghai stock market is recording its lowest value in the last 5 years.

item.title: Euphoria and record levels on global stock markets
item.description: Artificial intelligence and its development have also influenced other sectors.

item.title: Hedera in a new ascent
item.description: Hedera Hashgraph (HBAR) is experiencing new growth and its highest price in the last year.

item.title: ECB in record loss
item.description: The European Central Bank (ECB) operated with the largest loss in its history.

item.title: Banking giant's profit drops in the last quater of 80 % 2023.
item.description: HSBC, the British banking giant, reported an 80% decline in profits, all due to its stake in the Chinese Bank of Communications (BoCom).

item.title: On Coinbase, we have the lowest level of Bitcoin since 2015.
item.description: One of the reasons for the rise in the price of Bitcoin (BTC) along with increased interest and the entry of ETF funds is this.

item.title: New rise in BTC price in 2024
item.description: The price has exceeded $53,000, which is the highest price in the past year and a growth of over 250%.

item.title: Analyst expectations for btc price are modest
item.description: The halving is approaching, and analysts predict that the price could reach $70,000.

item.title: Crypto in the nick of time
item.description: Billionaire Peter Thiel invested over $200 million in BTC and ETH just before the price increase and the start of the BULL market.

item.title: Dominance of the american dollar and is a change imminent?
item.description: It is no secret that the United States is the number one global power thanks to military supremacy, as well as the dollar being the number 1 global currency.

item.title: Ethereum (ETH) hits a new record
item.description: The staking platform shared data indicating that 25% of the total Ethereum supply has been removed from the market and is currently being staked.

item.title: If you are inclined towards gold,consider this option as well
item.description: Are you an investor who enjoys precious metals and invests in gold, or are you just planning to enter into a position as part of your portfolio?

item.title: Crazy surge in non-purpose loans in Croatia
item.description: In Croatia, interest rates have not risen as in other member states, which of course favored citizens to take on additional debt.

item.title: Investigation into 3 largest telecoms in Croatia
item.description: The Competition Protection Agency (AZNT) has initiated proceedings against HT, A1, and Telemach, alleging that they colluded and coordinated prices by introducing an index clause.

item.title: Energy investments
item.description: The majority of investments in energy are allocated to solar power plants.

item.title: Expectations for gold in 2024
item.description: All economic and geopolitical indicators suggest that the price of gold could continue to rise in the new year.

item.title: India and russia: new-old economic friends
item.description: We know that states and investors do not have friends, only interests, but this relationship, besides being beneficial for its participants, is also good for the whole world.

item.title: Monero (XMR) and an uncertain future
item.description: One of the few anonymous cryptocurrencies, which is limited and offers privacy and anonymity, is soon to cease trading on BINANCE.

item.title: Fortenova group divests from agriculture, stock markets slow down due to inflation while banks break records
item.description: We concluded the previous year, marked by rising costs, both in borrowing and in daily life.

item.title: How your psyche affects investment decisions
item.description: A topic that is rarely discussed and not given much importance, yet it is actually very important and extensive and can influence your decision-making, and ultimately whether your investment will be successful or not.

item.title: Chainlink (LINK) unlocks tokens worth 340 million USD
item.description: This cryptocurrency, which aims to incentivize a global network of computers by providing reliable information from around the world via smart contracts on the blockchain, recently unlocked over 19 million LINK tokens - equivalent to over $340 million.

item.title: Investing in gold and silver - YES or NO?
item.description: Every investment is good; the question is only how risky it is and what returns can be expected.

item.title: Index funds or ETF's
item.description: Similar but still different. ETF funds are considered more accessible for entry and exit than traditional index funds.

item.title: AVAX - Avalanche Prepares to Release 9.5 Million Tokens
item.description: The blockchain platform is preparing for significant development in February. The expected release of various projects is valued at around $900 million.

item.description: Our biggest enemies in investing are ourselves. By controlling and disciplining ourselves, we achieve the greatest financial benefits and financial freedom.

item.description: Every beginning is difficult in every business, including the world of finance.

item.description: Diversification in investing is always important, and a good plan with clear goals is necessary.

item.title: Setting financial goals
item.description: If you don’t have clear short-term, medium-term, and long-term goals, you’ll likely spend more and fall into the vicious cycle of debt, particularly credit card debt, which is undoubtedly the most expensive and unfavorable option for you.
